name: Beth Mashburn
text: Very crowed! So I got take out.. So good! I'll will be back!

name: Maximus Corvus
text: It's great Pizza, but oh man I got heartburn later. Flavored crusts are a fine line - a thin crust, if I must - between eye-rolling deliciousness and stomach-churning over-indulgence. Ymmv...

name: Antoinette Gray
text: My food had a funny smell and tasted horrible I want to try something new when I shouldve went to domins.. I would not recommend this place to anybody it's just a high price little ceasers to me and my rating never this low but I couldnt even finish this

name: Daniel Galbraith
text: Had a Howie chicken roll. Was not impressed. Thought I would try it since I had a buy one get one free offer.

name: Tiffany Lyons
text: Love their pizza and workers are awesome when they deliver!

name: Linda Kelly
text: Nice place. Great staff. Food was amazing. Will be ordering more for our game night. I ordered the angry chicken, my girl ordered the classic club pizza. Both left us full and satisfied. We also ordered the mozzarella sticks and bread sticks. Fantastic tasting!

name: Brendon Herzig
text: Love their pizza! They invented pizza crust!

name: Tianon Gravi
text: Howie's is always one of my favorite pizza places (I can only describe their flavors and grease levels as "EXTRA"), and this location is no exception. They've always treated me well, and made my pizza exactly to order. Looking forward to next time!

name: 1SG143FA
text: Just moved back to Vegas after 20 years. Boys were hungry and papa didn‚Äôt want to make dinner. We wanted to try something different. And I‚Äôm glad we did. Think we found a new pizza place!

name: David Pearl
text: Delicious pizza and fast service.

name: Johnny R
text: I give this place 5 stars! I am happy that it is here in Vegas. Great prices for amazing pizza. A little light sauce rather than a thick sauce, but overall pepperoni cooked nice and just a tad from crispy with some great cheese topping. ‚Ä¶More

name: Pappy
text: Just picked up my order from the Simmons location and everything was great. The Works pizza was tasty and the service was very professional. Will remind my family and friends about this location and the service received. Not to mention the great pizza.

name: Miracle 1985
text: I order from here for the first time tonight. Wanted to try something new and dominos don't offer my favorite  topping at the moment. Checked other local pizza spots in my area and prices was unbelievable came across hungry howie's pizza üçï ‚Ä¶More

text: Samantha is awesome, makes sure your pizza is amazing.

text: Pizza  is good i was just wondering why none of the workers were wearing mask or gloves

text: I ordered my food online, but ordered at the wrong location. I did not realize that until I got to the store. When I got there and discussed it with the lady at the counter, she said she would ask her manager how to handle the situation. ‚Ä¶More

name: Jean Thomas
text: Good pizza, got the thin pizza, wish the crust was a little crisper, but overall it was good.  Grub hub delivered and they were awesome!

name: Krys
text: Don't trust the app for order status. My pizza was done and the app said it was still being made. Also, the front door is locked and you have to user the door bell to get their attention and then they'll buzz you in. Pizza was great.

name: Elliotte Banes
text: Delicious Pizza ever.

name: K Trice
text: I've ordered twice from this place and each time the food was delicious! I ordered takeout eavh time and was given a delivery est. of 45 min etc... it was delivered way before that. Great pizza hot and baked to perfection and the wings were hella good. I  would definitely recommend this place gor sure!

text: I loved the pizza it was hot, fresh and delicious.  Only thing I wish there was one on the East side.

name: dean martin1958
text: Yummy flavor crusts and just great pizza period...highly recommend

name: shelly marshall
text: My sausage pizza was dry  and had very little sausage.  Maybe they ran out of meat because it was near closing time.  Waste of $10.00.  I will just eat the crust as bread and eat with another meat and vegetable to make a meal.  Service was good, pizza not so good.

name: Michael Kilar
text: Fantastic flavored crust! When they say extra cheese, they mean extra cheese! Love it. Knocked half a star off as there didn't seem to be any sauce on the pizza. Will definitely add extra sauce next order. Knocked off another half a star ‚Ä¶More

name: Effie Rucker
text: Some people make this too complicated. This place has pizza, and it's usually ready for you and there's usually not a wait unless you're getting a whole pie. Yeah, it's a tad spendy, but it's in the Cosmo, and everything is spendy in Vegas now a days.

text: They're always so nice. My order is always perfect and on time! I love them!

name: Jessica Johnson
text: So Good! Just like back home in Michigan. It was delicious. The pizza was cheesy hot and had really good flavor. I ordered the Butter Cheese Stuffed Crust Cheeser Pleaser. The store was clean and the staff member was friendly. This is definitely going to be our neighborhood pizza go-to spot.

text: This is one of my family's new favorite pizza places. The pizzas aren't $5, but they get close, and they taste better than what you can get for less. The sweet cinnamon breadsticks are excellent, almost like cinnamon rolls, once you add the icing.
